## IKeyManager.keyManagerSign() method

Generates a signature according to the algorithm specified.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
keyManagerSign(args: IKeyManagerSignArgs): Promise<string>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                                                 | Description |
| --------- | ---------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| args      | [IKeyManagerSignArgs](./core.ikeymanagersignargs.md) |             |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;string&gt;

## Exceptions

`Error("not_supported")` if the KMS does not support the operation or if the key does not match the algorithm.
